data.name: AgreeTermsOfService
data.value: Ви повинні погодитися з нашими Умовами надання послуг
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to create a new MEGA account without accept previously the 'Terms of Service'.

data.name: ConfirmAccountFailed
data.value: Не вдалося підтвердити акаунт. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the confirmation of a MEGA account failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: ConfirmAccountFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the confirmation of a MEGA account failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ConfirmAccountSucces
data.value: Ваш обліковий запис було створено, підтверджено та активовано. Ви увійдете автоматично.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when confirm a MEGA account succesfully.

data.name: ConfirmAccountSucces_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when confirm a MEGA account succesfully - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ConfirmNeeded
data.value: Перевірте вашу електронну пошту і натисніть ланку для входу і підтвердження акаунту
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user create a new MEGA account successfully, informing that will receive an e-mail with a link to confirm account.

data.name: ConfirmNeeded_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user create a new MEGA account successfully, informing that will receive an e-mail with a link to confirm account - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CreateAccountFailed
data.value: Не вдалося створити Хмарний диск MEGA. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the creation of a MEGA account failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: CreateAccountFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the creation of a MEGA account failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CreateFolderFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the creation of a folder failed.

data.name: CreateFolderFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the creation of a folder failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CreateFolderSuccess
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when create a folder successfully.

data.name: CreateFolderSuccess_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when create a folder successfully - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DeleteNodeFailed
data.value: Не вдалося видалити елемент. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to delete a node failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: DeleteNodeFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to delete a node failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DownloadLinkFailed
data.value: Не вдалося отримати ланку завантаження. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when failed to retrieve a download link.

data.name: DownloadLinkFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when failed to retrieve a download link - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DownloadNodeFailed
data.value: Не вдалося завантажити файл. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a node failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: DownloadNodeFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a node failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: FetchingNodesFailed
data.value: Не вдалося відновити файли і теки з MEGA. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to fetch nodes from the MEGA cloud service failed.

data.name: FetchingNodesFailed_Title
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to fetch nodes from the MEGA cloud service failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: FolderCreateFailed
data.value: Не вдалося створити теку. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to create a folder failed.

data.name: FolderCreateFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to create a folder failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetLinkFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a link to a node failed.

data.name: GetLinkFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a link to a node failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetPreviewFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image preview failed.

data.name: GetPreviewFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image preview failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ImageSaved
data.value: Зображення успішно експортовано у альбом 'збереження знімків'
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a image is saved/exported successfully saved to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device.

data.name: ImageSaved_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a image is saved/exported successfully saved to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ImageSaveError
data.value: Помилка експорту зображення у альбом 'збереження знімків'. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to save/export an image to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device.

data.name: ImageSaveError_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to save/export an image to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ImportFileFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import an image. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: ImportFileFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import an image - (String as short as possible).

data.name: LinkCopiedToClipboard
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to copy a MEGA link to the clipboard.

data.name: LinkCopiedToClipboard_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to copy a MEGA link to the clipboard - (String as short as possible).

data.name: LoginFailed
data.value: Вхід у Хмарний диска MEGA не виконано. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the login to the MEGA cloud service api fails. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: LoginFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the login to the MEGA cloud service api fails - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MoveEqualsParent
data.value: Тека призначення співпадає з вихідною текою Перенесення скасовано.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move nodes and the destination folder is the same than the source folder.

data.name: MoveEqualsParent_Title
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move nodes and the destination folder is the same than the source folder - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MoveFailed
data.value: Не вдалося перемістити елемент. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move a file failed.

data.name: MoveFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move a file failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PasswordsDoNotMatch
data.value: Паролі не співпадають. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create a MEGA account and the introduced passwords don't match.

data.name: PictureSaved
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when save successfully a single picture in the photo album.

data.name: PictureSaved_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when save successfully a single picture in the photo album - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RemoveItemQuestion
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove definitely an itemfrom the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to do it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the name of the item to be removed in runtime.

data.name: RemoveItemQuestion_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove definitely an item from the rubbish bin failed, asking for confirmation to do it - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RemoveNodeFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request remove definitely an item from the rubbish bin failed.

data.name: RemoveNodeFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request remove definitely an item from the rubbish bin failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RemoveNodeSuccess
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when remove successfully a node definitely from the rubbish bin.

data.name: RemoveNodeSuccess_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when remove successfully a node definitely from the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RenameNodeFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove definitely an item node from the rubbish bin failed.

data.name: RenameNodeFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove definitely an item node from the rubbish bin failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RequiredFieldsConfirmAccount
data.value: Будь ласка, введіть свій обраний пароль.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for confirm account are not filled in.

data.name: RequiredFieldsCreateAccount
data.value: Будь ласка, заповніть ваше ім'я, адресу електронної пошти та пароль
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for create account are not filled in.

data.name: RequiredFieldsLogin
data.value: Будь ласка, введіть свою адресу електронної пошти та пароль MEGA.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for login are not filled in.

data.name: RequiredFields_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when any required field is not filled in - (String as short as possible).

data.name: SaveImageQuestion
data.value: Експортувати поточне зображення у альбом 'збереження знімків'?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to save a image to the 'saved pictures' album, asking for confirmation to do it.

data.name: SaveImageQuestion_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to save a image to the 'saved pictures' album, asking for confirmation to do it - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UserNotOnline
data.value: Ви не увійшли у MEGA щоб зробити це. Будь ласка, перезайдіть.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is online and is trying to do any operation that requires connection.

data.name: UserNotOnline_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the user is online and is trying to do any operation that requires connection - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetThumbnailFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image thumbnail failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: GetThumbnailFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image thumbnail failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetAccountDetailsFailed
data.value: Не вдалося отримати дані облікового запису. Будь ласка, спробуйте пізніше. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user account details failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: GetAccountDetailsFailed_Title
data.value: Не вдалося отримати дані облікового запису
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user account details failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: LoggedOut
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user logged out successfully.

data.name: LoggedOut_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user logged out successfully - (String as short as possible).

data.name: LogoutFailed
data.value: Не вдалося вийти. Будь ласка спробуйте ще раз. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the logout to the MEGA cloud service api fails. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: LogoutFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the logout to the MEGA cloud service api fails - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MultiSelectRemoveQuestion
data.value: Ви впевнені, що хочете видалити {0} елементів?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be removed in runtime.

data.name: MultiSelectRemoveQuestion_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MultiRemoveSucces
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when remove successfully multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be moved in runtime.

data.name: MultiRemoveSucces_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when remove successfully multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MoveToRubbishBinFailed
data.value: Не вдалося перемістити елемент у кошик. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move nodes to the rubbish bin failed.

data.name: MoveToRubbishBinFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move nodes to the rubbish bin failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MoveToRubbishBinQuestion
data.value: Ви дійсно хочете перемістити {0} у кошик?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move a single node to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the name of the node to be moved in runtime.

data.name: MoveToRubbishBinQuestion_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to move a single node to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MoveToRubbishBinSuccess
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when move successfully one single node to the rubbish bin.

data.name: MoveToRubbishBinSuccess_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when move successfully one single node to the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MultiMoveToRubbishBinQuestion
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move multiple nodes to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be moved in runtime.

data.name: MultiMoveToRubbishBinQuestion_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to move multiple nodes to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MultiMoveToRubbishBinSucces
data.value: {0} елементів переміщено у кошик для сміття
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when move successfully multiple nodes to the rubbish bin. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be moved in runtime.

data.name: MultiMoveToRubbishBinSucces_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when move successfully multiple nodes to the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PendingTransfersLogout
data.value: Ви маєте {0} очікуваних переказів. Вони будуть скасовані. Ви дійсно хочете вийти?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to logout the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to logout. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of pending transfers in runtime.

data.name: PendingTransfersLogout_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to logout the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to logout - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PendingTransfersExit
data.value: Ви маєте {0} очікуваних переказів. Вони будуть скасовані. Ви дійсно хочете вийти?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to exit the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to exit. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of pending transfers in runtime.

data.name: PendingTransfersExit_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to exit the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to exit - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AlreadyConfirmedAccount
data.value: Цей обліковий запис вже підтверджено. Ви можете увійти у систему.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account that has been already confirmed previously.

data.name: AlreadyConfirmedAccount_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account that has been already confirmed previously - (String as short as possible).

data.name: WrongPassword
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that the app requires that the user type the password and the user types a wrong password.

data.name: WrongPassword_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the app requires that the user type the password and the user types a wrong password - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DownloadLimitMessage
data.value: Ви вибрали більше 100 елементів ({0}) для завантаження. Продовжити?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user would try to download at the same time more nodes than the reliable number of simultaneous downloads for a good app performance. This dialog ask confirmation to start the download process. Preserve the ({0}) codes because is for include the maximum reliable download number and the precise number of nodes to be downloaded in runtime.

data.name: DownloadLimitMessage_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user would try to download at the same time more nodes than the reliable number of simultaneous downloads for a good app performance. This dialog ask confirmation to start the download process - (String as short as possible).

data.name: QuestionAskedDownloadOption
data.value: Бажаєте автоматично експортувати зображення у альбом після завантаження? Згодом ви можете змінити цю установку на сторінці налаштувань. Інші типи файлів можна зберігати тільки у пам'яті додатку.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Asks if wants to export image files to the photo album after download in future and informs that user can change this option afterwards.

data.name: PausingTransfersFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to pause transfers failed.

data.name: PausingTransfersFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to pause transfers failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ResumingTransfersFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to resume transfers failed.

data.name: ResumingTransfersFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to resume transfers failed.

data.name: MinimalPictureSelection
data.value: Будь ласка, виберіть принаймні одне зображення для відвантаження
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to do a multi image upload and haven't selected any element.

data.name: MinimalPictureSelection_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to do a multi image upload and haven't selected any element - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PrepareImageForUploadFailed
data.value: Не вдалося підготувати зображення: {0} для відвантаження
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a image for upload failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the file name in runtime.

data.name: PrepareImageForUploadFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a image for upload failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PhotoUploadError
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a photo failed.

data.name: PhotoUploadError_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a photo failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: FileNotFound
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to open a file that can't be found and the process failed.

data.name: FileNotFound_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user try to open a file that can't be found and the process failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: OpenFileFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to open a file failed.

data.name: OpenFileFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to open a file failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UploadSelfieFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a selfie picture failed.

data.name: UploadSelfieFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a selfie picture failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: LoadNodesFailed
data.value: Не вдалося завантажити файли і теки з MEGA. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз або натисніть на оновлення.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the nodes of the MEGA cloud service.

data.name: LoadNodesFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the nodes of the MEGA cloud service - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PinLockCodesDoNotMatch
data.value: PIN коди не співпадають. Будь ласка, введіть їх повторно і переконайтесь що вони однакові
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced codes don't match. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: PinLockCodesDoNotMatch_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced codes don't match. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word - (String as short as possible).

data.name: SessionIDError
data.value: Ви вийшли з цього пристрою з іншого місця
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is logged out from another location and is trying to do any operation that requires a valid session (API_ESID Error).

data.name: OverquotaAlert
data.value: Операцію не буде виконано, інакше перевищиться ліміт збереження даних вашого облікового запису. Хочете покращити акаунт?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type.

data.name: OverquotaAlert_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type - (String as short as possible).

data.name: NoDownloadLocationSelected
data.value: Не вибрано теку завантажень за обумовлюванням.Щоб продовжити завантаження, будь ласка, виберіть теку або виберіть у налаштуваннях типову теку завантаження.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to download some nodes and the app doesn't have configured a default download location. Asks the user to select a location for this download or configure a default location.

data.name: PrepareFileForUploadFailed
data.value: Не вдалося підготувати для відвантаження файл: {0}
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file for upload failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the file name in runtime.

data.name: PrepareFileForUploadFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file for upload failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: SessionIDError_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the user is logged out from another location and is trying to do any operation that requires a valid session (API_ESID Error) - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CopyFileFailed
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed by a non specific cause. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: CopyFileFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed by a non specific cause - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CopyFileUnauthorizedAccessException
data.value: Копіювання цього файлу у теку призначення заборонено. Можливо ви намагаєтесь скопіювати на SD карту файл непідтримуваного типу. Будь ласка, спробуйте зберегти/скопіювати файл на внутрішню пам'ять пристрою.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type).

data.name: CopyFileUnauthorizedAccessException_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type) - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ClipboardFailed
data.value: Не вдалося скопіювати майстер-ключ в буфер. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails to copy the user's masterkey to the clipboard to be saved or exported.

data.name: ClipboardFailed_Title
data.value: Не вдалося виконати операцію з буфером обміну
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails to copy the user's masterkey to the clipboard to be saved or exported - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CurrentPinLockCodeDoNotMatch
data.value: Поточний PIN-код невірний або не підходить
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to change the PIN lock code and introduces an incorrect code into the field for the current PIN lock code. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: CurrentPinLockCodeDoNotMatch_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to change the PIN lock code and introduces an incorrect code into the field for the current PIN lock code - (String as short as possible). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: MasterkeyCopied
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when copy the user's masterkey to the clipboard to be saved or exported.

data.name: MasterkeyCopied_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when copy the user's masterkey to the clipboard to be saved or exported - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PinLockTooShort
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced code is too short (less than 4 digits). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: PinLockTooShort_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced code is too short (less than 4 digits). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CacheCleared
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the cache memory is successfully cleared by user request.

data.name: CacheCleared_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the cache memory is successfully cleared by user request.

data.name: MemoryLimitError
data.value: Недостатньо вільної пам'яті для завершення операції. Додаток буде закрито.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the app exceeds the memory limit quota of the device.

data.name: MemoryLimitError_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the app exceeds the memory limit quota of the device - (String as short as possible).

data.name: QuestionAskedDownloadOption_NoButton
data.comment: Button of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Option to only download into the local folder of the app and don't export automatically to the photo album after downloads - (String as short as possible).

data.name: QuestionAskedDownloadOption_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Asks if wants to export image files to the photo album after download in future and informs that user can change this option afterwards - (String as short as possible).

data.name: QuestionAskedDownloadOption_YesButton
data.comment: Button of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Option automatically download to the photo album after downloads - (String as short as possible).

data.name: SelectFolderFailed
data.value: Не вдалося вибрати теку. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз або виберіть іншу теку: [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to select a folder failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to select a folder failed - (String as short as possible).
